title: Frontend Engineering Intern
description: Designed, developed, and maintained scalable frontend systems, collaborated with cross-functional teams, optimized database structures, wrote high-quality code, troubleshooted technical issues, and engaged in performance optimization and mentorship during a remote internship from 12/2023 to 04/2024.

title: Front Desk Clerk
description: As a Front Desk Clerk at IHG Hotels & Resorts, I provide exceptional guest service, manage check-ins/outs, handle reservations, and address guest inquiries for a seamless experience.
